ExploreFact.Text: A desolate planet of ice and snow.
I found a series of ice tunnels beneath the planet's <color=orange>sunward</color> side. There's lots of <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color> within.

RumorFact.Text: I can see a structure beneath the surface on the dark side of <color=orange>Frost Car</color>, but I can't access it from here.

AltText.Text: I found a structure beneath the surface on the dark side of <color=orange>Frost Car</color>. I reached it through ice tunnels on the planet's <color=orange>sunward</color> side.

ExploreFact.Text: This area is littered with <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color> crystals.

<color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color> crystals were harvested from here and taken to <color=orange>Locomocean</color>. The smaller ones were used to make fuel and a larger one was going to be used to make a new and improved <color=orange>Advanced Warp Core</color>.

RumorFact.Text: The warp pad here seems to be missing a <color=orange>white hole</color> warp core.

ExploreFact.Text: The warp pad here seems to be missing a <color=orange>white hole</color> warp core.
The warp core I found fit perfectly!
<color=lightblue>Enji</color> blocked off the core to avoid falling down, but noted that the <color=orange>first turn</color> at the entrance to the ice tunnels leads directly there.
<color=lightblue>Enji</color> also noticed that the tunnels blocked by <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color> seem to forge a more direct route to the core.

RumorFact.Text: <color=lightblue>Enji</color> blocked off the core to avoid falling down, but noted that the <color=orange>first turn</color> at the entrance to the ice tunnels leads directly there.

ExploreFact.Text: I managed to reach the core of <color=orange>Frost Car</color>!

AltText.Text: A scroll describing the train's whistle was found here.

RumorFact.Text: I found a scroll within <color=orange>Frost Car's</color> core.

ExploreFact.Text: <color=lightblue>Enji</color> set up the train's <color=orange>whistle</color> to sound off every <color=orange>two minutes</color>. More steam is pumped through during this time to <color=orange>dissipate excess</color><color=lightblue> Ghost Matter </color><color=orange>fumes</color>.
